text:
@CNNnewsroom @SoulBirdr @BrookeBCNN IMO | I wish @CNN and @MSNBC would stop using pulsating purple graphics of #COVID19 cells as backgrounds and "wipes" between segments. If the cell was shaped like a big ol' dick you wouldn't use it, would you?

Enough!
